definition: The term "nächster" refers to the immediate individual or item in a sequence, typically used to describe the closest or nearest person, object, or occurrence in relation to a specific context. It is commonly employed when discussing proximity, order, or selection.

examples.german: Der nächste Zug fährt um 10 Uhr ab.
examples.english: The next train departs at 10 o'clock.

examples.german: Der nächste Supermarkt ist nur wenige Gehminuten entfernt.
examples.english: The nearest supermarket is only a few minutes' walk away.

examples.german: Der nächste Termin ist am Montag um 14 Uhr.
examples.english: The next appointment is on Monday at 2 o'clock.

examples.german: Der nächste Flug nach Berlin startet in einer Stunde.
examples.english: The next flight to Berlin will depart in one hour.

examples.german: Der nächste Bus kommt in 10 Minuten.
examples.english: The next bus will arrive in 10 minutes.
